API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.animation.IKeyFramed

type
interface
version
3.2
Interface for items that are key framed, Key frames have geometry for specific frames, with any in-between frames being interpolated by Sandy.

Instance Variables

appendFrameCopy(default,method) : frameNumber : Int -> Int

Appends frame copy to animation. You can use this to rearrange an animation at runtime, create transitions, etc.

frame(__getFrame,__setFrame) : Float

Frame number. You can tween this value to play key framed animation.

frameCount(__getFrameCount,null) : Int

Number of frames available in animation

frameUpdateBounds(__getFrameUpdateBounds,__setFrameUpdateBounds) : Bool

If set to true, bounds will be updated on each frame change. Bounds are set either to whole frame numbers or interpolated based on the interpolateBounds setting.

interpolateBounds(__getInterpolateBounds,__setInterpolateBounds) : Bool

If set, the boundingBox and sphere will be interpolated on each frame change. if updateBounds is true. This involves an interpolation of the bounds between frames, and if set to false, the bounds will be based on the closest whole frame. Default is false (off).

replaceFrame(default,method) : destFrame : Int -> sourceFrame : Float -> Void

Replaces specified frame with other key or interpolated frame.
